title: Femina - 25 March 2016 (gnv64)
description:
Femina - 25 March 2016
English | 80 pages | True PDF | 22.5 mb 
http://www.femina.in/

The story of Femina, reads much like the story of the Indian woman.
For over 50 years now, Femina, India's first and largest read women's English magazine has long been the definitive life and lifestyle guide for progressive woman.
In this brave new age of the multi-faceted, multitasking woman, Femina still remains the referral point for women who are expanding their roles, and exploring new frontiers. And continues to talk to forward- thinking women on issues that matter most to them. Periodicity: Fortnightly
